rows.label: qev060106_MSG0003
rows.name:
I came here hoping to get the chance to watch him do
his devoltanizing thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0004
rows.name:
But when I arrived, he was arguing with a very
suspicious woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0005
rows.name:
Then all of a sudden, she threw him into a trailer and
drove out of the city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_SEL0011
rows.name: Find out what Jeffrey knows about the woman.

rows.label: qev060106_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire as to what they were arguing about.

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0006
rows.name:
Not much, although I've seen her in the administrative
district a few times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0007
rows.name:
I think she's a BLADE. Look for a woman with silver
hair wearing a Skell pilot suit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0008
rows.name:
It sounded like she was demanding that Shiraton hand
over his backpack and the staff he was holding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0009
rows.name:
She was quite threateningâ€”I'm ashamed to say I was
frozen with fear until she drove off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0010
rows.name:
The trailer headed out the east gate and kept cutting
east across Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0011
rows.name:
A crazy stunt like this could undermine the relationship
we've managed to build with the Zaruboggan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0012
rows.name: Can you head out into Primordia and help Shiraton?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0013
rows.name:
I've been asking around, and it sounds like the trailer
Shiraton is in headed out the east gate and then went
east across Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060106_MSG0014
rows.name:
Please go help him before someone does something
that can't be undone![ST:wait ]
